name: RILAKKUMA TUMBLR DASHBOARD ICONS
description:
I don't know how to put icons together with a whole rilakkuma dash, but if anyone knows, feel free to message me at b0b0.tumblr.com!
And if it doesn't work message me too, I can help ya step by step.
additional_info:
You need Stylish and chrome/firefox I guess
ALSO!!! once you install it you may want to go to edit>specify>urls starting with> then put in http :// www.tumblr.com without the spaces
it might not matter but try it if it doesnt work OKAY you're welcome guys
